alert.note: Alert for McCreary; Wayne; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 8:40PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Wayne, McCreary and southwestern Whitley Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 839 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Great Meadows Campsites, or 11 miles west of Oneida, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Co-Operative around 850 PM EDT. Blue Heron around 855 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Whitley City, Pine Knot, Stearns, Strunk, Marshes Siding, Hollyhill, Beulah Heights and Duckrun. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
